posts.message: What's the story of this group ?

posts.caption: cylonjs.com
posts.description: Cylon.js is a JavaScript framework for robotics, physical computing, and the Internet of Things using Node.js. It provides a simple, yet powerful way to create JavaScript robots that incorporate multiple, different hardware devices at the same time.

posts.caption: conceptf1.blogspot.com
posts.description: ConceptF1 helps in understanding programming concepts. It has articles related to AngularJs, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, CSharp and other programming languages.

posts.message:
Very close people to me knows I'm interested in Machine Learning & Prediction So I'd like to share with you something that is not new but has proven lately it's worth to watch. 

It's Apache Mahout comes with packed selected Recommendation Algorithms and play awesome with Apache Spark.

However I'm not an Expert in that yet but if there is anything I can help please let me know. Also Please recommend Other solutions are being used at your company.

If you wanna play with something that is not complicated please check http://prediction.io/

Good Luck guys!
